from typing import List

def floodFill(image: List[List[int]], sr: int, sc: int, newColor: int) -> List[List[int]]:
    (rows, cols) = (len(image), len(image[0]))
    currColor = image[sr][sc]

    def dfs(x: int, y: int):
        if x < 0 and x >= rows and (y < 0) and (y >= cols) and (image[x][y] != currColor) and (image[x][y] == newColor):
            return
        image[x][y] = newColor
        dfs(x + 1, y)
        dfs(x - 1, y)
        dfs(x, y + 1)
        dfs(x, y - 1)
    dfs(sr, sc)
    return image
